View on GitHub

KGQA-leaderboard

Repository to track the progress in Question Answering over Knowledge Graphs (KGQA), including the datasets and the current state-of-the-art for the most common KGQA tasks.

WebQuestions

WebQuestions [1] is a significantly large QA dataset constructed to solve real-world questions. Its questions were collected from Google Suggest API and answers were crowdsourced via Amazon Mechanic Turk. It consists of 5810 questions-answering pairs.

Leaderboard

References

[1] Berant, Jonathan, Andrew Chou, Roy Frostig, and Percy Liang. Semantic parsing on freebase from question-answer pairs. In Proceedings of the 2013 conference on empirical methods in natural language processing, pp. 1533-1544. 2013.
